about_the_game:
Betroyal is a fast-paced roguelite turn-based tactical game, that took best from roguelike tactics genre. Pass through regions full of encounters, hire and upgrade units, get epic perks, abilities and items fro your commander and kill all bosses. And again, but with crazy build that you always wanted to try.

Build up your camp to draft more powerful and rare units, and unlock new perks for the protagonist.

The sheer variety of tactical and strategic options makes Betroyal a true treat for any ardent fans of the roguelite genre.

Core Features:


  • Hundreds of builds for your commander from classic to the most insane
  • A new look at a turn-based combat system
  • Three regions with procedural generations of encounters
  • 50+ units, including Meat Wagon and Swine Lord, to hire and upgrade with more than 200 individual abilities
  • Camp building to unlock devastating possibilities
  • Narrative image of father-daughter relationships without tons of texts
  • Classic tactics and roguelite features, including numerous commander builds, procedural map generation, and high replay value

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

short_description: Betroyal is a fast-paced roguelite turn-based tactical game, in which you play as a king dethroned by his own daughter. Gather an army from scratch, hire different mercenaries with exclusive skills, and level up your commander unlocking new destructive powers to get your throne back!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
